claims.claim: AI-generated copy achieved up to 450% increase in clickthrough rates compared to human-written copy
claims.quote: The trial, which began in 2016, saw an uplift in clickthrough rates as high as 450% when text redrafted by the AI was compared to that of a human marketer's original copy.

claims.claim: AI-generated copy lifted click-through rates up to 450% versus manually written copy which only achieved 50-200% uplift
claims.quote: Tests showed that copy generated by Persado's AI technology lifted click-through rates as much as 450% versus manually written copy, which resulted in a lower uptick of between 50% to 200%.

claims.claim: AI-generated headline nearly doubled weekly applications from 25 to 47
claims.quote: In one test, human copywriters came up with the headline 'Access cash from the equity in your home' coupled with a 'take a look' call for action button. This generated 25 applications a week, the Wall Street Journal reported. However, a Persado AI version generated 47 applications a week with the headline 'It's true – You can unlock cash from the equity in your home' and a suggestion to 'click to apply'.

claims.claim: AI drove better marketing performance and created language that resonates more with customers
claims.quote: Not only did they drive better marketing performance, but they created language that resonates more with our customers

claims.quote: In pilot tests, Persado's AI-generated ad copy delivered click-through rates up to 450% higher than human-written equivalents.
